readable.title: 3697675767_97796334e4
readable.content: A bicycle rider flies over a hill while a competitor is not far behind . A dirt bike racer jumping off a hill with another racer not far behind . A motocross rider is slightly airborne on a competition circuit jump . A person is riding a dirt bike in a race on a dirt track . Dirtbike rider jumps over a hill of a racetrack .
